1432111.content:
She was... stunning to say the least. She was drop dead gorgeous. She shimmed into the room in high heels and black leather pants. Her leather top left her well toned belly bare to the world. You could see the sparkle of a diamond attached to her belly button piercing. Her long flowing blond hair framed a model like face. Her piercing blue eyes promised nothing but agony as they bore into your soul. Even without heels she would be close to 6 feet, in them she towered over everyone in the room.

In her hands was a riding crop. She took a deep breath that made her voluptuous bosom swell gloriously. You stared in awe at the woman. No wonder your wife had chosen to be with someone else. She looked like Pamela Anderson in her prime! Even better!

Tanya went to her new lover and a stab of jealousy streaked through your heart as they kissed. As this kiss broke the blond woman said, "Well my dear, don't be rude introduce us."

Tanya quickly gave a little jerk of her head and said, "Of course, where are my manners. Samantha this is Mistress Valerie, Mistress this is Samantha my wife." Valerie stalked forward in her heels to where you were bound helplessly. "A pleasure to meet you. You are not half bad looking slave, we'll get you to lose those pounds pretty quickly. I'm sure you are wondering what exactly your new role in the relationship will be. Quite simply you are going to be our little baby."

You must of looked disbelieving because Valerie slapped her crop hard against your bare breast.

"You will be our little baby except for one hour a day. That one hour will be adult time. And if you have been a good baby, it will be enjoyable. But if you've been bad... well lets just say that this little toy here is going to be least of your worries."

Absolutely terrified now you started to plead. "Please don't do this. Please, I'll never see you again - I won't tell anyone. God please just let me go, please I'm an adult I want to live my life. You've taken my love, my wife isn't that enough?" Valerie looked into your eyes without a shred of sympathy.

"No. It isn't enough. I am going to break your mind until you are literally my helpless little baby."

Valerie turned away from you and snapped her fingers. "Tanya lets go. Its time to leave baby here by herself. Try not to make too much of mess now, you don't want to make mommy mad." With that the two of them left you naked save for your diaper.
1432111.title: Valerie a tall blond bombshell.  Total Sadist

choices: Is baby thirsty?  How about a bottle full of Mistress Piss!
Baby needs a good spanking for making a mess!
14321111.content:
You sat there on your knees stunned by the recent turn of events. You couldn't believe your wife was doing this to you! you began to weep at the unfairness of it all. After a time you stopped crying and tried to get out of your restraints again. It was futile, you weren't getting out. Worse you realized you couldn't even sit down! You would choke yourself on the collar, you had to be kneeling or standing. You switched positions several times trying to take the ache off of your knees but you would get tired of standing too.

Helpless you screamed but the walls were thick - no one was coming. Breaking down into tears again you wondered how long it had been. 3 hours? 4? How long had they said they would be? 24 hours? You thought you were going to go insane. You get as comfortable as you can kneeling down and try to get some sleep. It is not easy to get to sleep in that position. You start to feel your thirst. Your throat is sore from screaming and you lick your lips trying not to think about water. Even though you haven't drunk anything since you've been down here you do need to pee.

You try to hold it. You won't let them do this to you. You aren't going to piss in the diaper like a baby. You strain and try to ignore your bladder and settle down to sleep. But its impossible. Your knees hurt. Your back hurts. Your bladder hurts. You jerk at your bonds again, you slam your bound hands into the wooden support beam. How long had it been? How long had it been? You try to keep your mind off of your bladder. You try to stop thinking about the utter betrayal the love of your life has done to you. It wasn't enough to replace you bu t now she was subjecting you to this torture.

"PLEASE LET ME OUT.... PLEASE!!!"

No answer.

How long has it been?

10 hours? 12 hours? Maybe its been 20 hours... no it hasn't been you just wish it had been.

Your hungry. Your thirsty. You need to pee. Your tired. Your sore. Oh god you need to pee so bad. You can't help it anymore, you stop clenching your bladder and let the urine flow. You feel the warm wetness as it coats your diaper. You cry from the utter shame and humiliation. Weeping for the third time you rail at your wife and her sadistic new lover. If only you could get free, you wanted to rip Valerie's perfect hair. Smash that evil pretty face. You weren't a violent woman but what they have just made you do... not that it matters. You are helpless. More hours pass.

And yet more time. Your knees throb with a dull ache, when you shift even slightly the pain turns into a sharp horror that makes you never want to move again. More hours pass, your parched throat is desperate for moisture. Had it been 24 hours? Had they lied? Were they going to keep you here until you died? You don't know and the terror is driving you mad.

Finally the door opens... they are back. At first you are filed with joy that you had been saved. You could get out of this diaper, you could drink water, you could get off of your knees and feet. But then a chill spreads down your spine. You made a mess... they were going to be angry. You take a thick painful swallow as your wife and her new Mistress walk down the stairs.

Its punishment time.
14321111.title: They return in 24 hours... you made a mess, BAD...

choices: Leave you there for another 24 hours.
143211111.content:
Valerie walked in with your wife Tanya.

"Is baby happy to see us?" Valerie taunted as she glided forward on her stiletto heels.

"P-please let me go. I'm so thirsty and my knees hurt," you beg.

Valerie just laughs. Tanya walks behind her. "Mistress Valerie baby Samantha looks a bit worse for wear. Maybe we should be a little merciful?"

Valerie strokes my wife's cheek softly and then lightly grabs her jaw and tilts it up to look at her.

"I know you still love your little wife but she's not been broken in yet. Once she's been completely broken down and made into our baby then I'll let you comfort her OK darling?"

Tanya submissively bows her head, "Yes Mistress Valerie."

You try to appeal to your wife again, "Tanya, baby, please let me go. This was hell, it was hell. I thought I was going to die, if you ever loved me let me go."

That evil sadist Valerie walks up to you and viciously backhands you. "Babies don't speak. Do not ever speak unless we ask you to. Next time you speak I'll make Tanya whip your breasts bloody." Her cold eyes left you no doubt that she would carry through with it. Seeing your silence she moved on.

"See she can be taught. Now baby was thirsty so we have prepared a bottle for baby."

Tanya pulled out a baby bottle with a nipple and everything. The liquid instead of being milk was yellow. You felt sick to your stomach when you realized it was urine. You let out a pitiful whimper as Tanya handed the bottle to Valerie.

The tall blond stroked your hair and pushed you to your knees. "Be a good baby or you'll get punished more."

She brought the bottle up to your lips and you forced yourself to part your lips and take the bottle in your mouth. You sucked on the urine and it entered your mouth. You gagged violently but the evil bitch kept the bottle in your mouth. It was disgusting, utterly disgusting. The slightly acidic urine went down your dry throat and provided relief and pain.

They boy made cooing sounds and talked about what a good baby you are for drinking from your bottle without a fuss. It was degrading and mortifying. Eventually you managed to completely empty the piss filled bottle.

Tanya checked your diaper and announced, "Uh oh it looks like baby made a mess."

Valerie gave an exaggerated sigh. "And you were doing so well too baby Samantha. Time for your punishment!"

You cringe in terror as you wait to hear what these monsters were going to do to you.
143211111.title: Is baby thirsty?  How about a bottle full of Mi...

1432111112.content:
You look at them with undisguised terror and you know that sadist Valerie is getting off on it.

"We are going to leave you here for another 24 hours baby." She announced casually.

You began sobbing and begging and pleading. Valerie raised her finger and shook it side to side.

"Naughty, Naughty baby. I don't mind you crying, babies do that but you aren't allowed to use words. I told you what would happen if used words without permission."

You suddenly remembered. She was going to have your wife whip your breasts for that infraction. You looked up at Tanya, you don't dare speak a word but you plead with your eyes. Plead for some shred of mercy. Tanya kneels down next to you and forces your head to face Valerie.

"Don't look at me baby. She is the Mistress. I'll do anything she asks. I love her. I love her far more than I ever loved you."

Those cruel barbs sting your soul. All the more so because you hear the pure and unadulterated truth in them. Tanya may still have some feelings for you but she loved Valerie far more. She slapped your face lightly and got up. She walked over and grabbed a riding crop from the bag.

Valerie looked at Tanya. "Do it, whip your wife until the blood is running from her disobedient breasts!"
1432111112.title: Leave you there for another 24 hours.

choices: The 24 hours pass and they return.
14321111121.content:
"Yes Mistress Valerie," your wife intones and raised the riding crop.

The first lash ripped across your breasts. It was like a line of fire had erupted across your chest. You scream, how could you not? Less than a second later the next blow came, and then next. You wail and cry as Tanya beats your breasts. On particularly nasty slash hit your right upon the nipple and you shriek in agony. You see Valerie laugh with glee, her large breasts bounce up and down and you feel a level of hate for her far more than you have ever felt. She took your wife away, she put you in this bondage, she was making the love of your life beat you.

Speaking of Tanya, she wasn't really enjoying it. She had a pensive look on her face. As she struck your breasts over and over again she started getting angry.

"Why are you making me do this baby? Why did you speak? Dammit do you think I like thrashing your the lovely round bags of fun? Why can't you just be a good baby!" She cried out as she lashed you harder and harder.

The pain was nearly indescribable, you don't have a high pain tolerance, you wanted to beg for an end but you were utterly terrified at what further punishment you would face if you spoke actual words again. The very thought sent shrieks of terror through your mind. You must never disobey Mistress Valerie.

"Yes Tanya, yes my wonderful little pet. Ruin your wife's breasts. Teach our little baby a lesson!"

"Yes Mistress!" Tanya nearly shouted as she continued to lash out with the crop, cutting line after line on your swiftly bruising breasts. Your voice was growing hoarse from all of your crying of agony. You just wanted it to stop. You just wanted it to stop. Your face was lined with tears as Tanya whipped you over and over and over again. You weren't counting but the number of strikes had to have been an excess of 500 before Valerie finally called a halt. Your breasts were bleeding, bruised, purple and utterly aflame with pain.

The tall blond grabbed you by the chin and forced you to look up into her eyes.

"You are a baby. I know you don't want to be a baby but you will be our baby. Never speak again. Never mouth human words. I may rescind this command if you are exceptionally good for the 1 hour of play time or I may require you to never speak again. The choice, is mine. Nod if you understand baby."

You nodded, abject terror filling your mind.

"Now that this is settled we'll leave you here for another 24 hours. Do try to get some rest dear." Valerie mocked as she and Tanya turned and left you still in the terrible bondage. You had another 24 hours of this. Your mind quailed at the thought, how could you possibly endure this?
14321111121.title: You are whipped bloody.

info.brief_description: Your partner falls in love with someone else but keeps you as their diapered plaything.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

The first few chapters let you decide who the characters are and the sort of things that will happen to your character. After that, the story should be like a "Choose Your Own Adventure" Book. It is written as though the reader was the main character and the choices offered are decisions that character can make.

The choices at the start result in a large number of different stories and I cannot write them all.

Currently I am focusing on two. Here are the links to the start of each:

1) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1868888-Threes-a-crowd/map/11312
In this one you are a married man but your wife is actually a lesbian. After she reveals this to you, her girlfriend moves in and you become their baby girl.

2) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1868888-Threes-a-crowd/map/111221
In this one you are a married man. Your wife falls in love with another man and they keep you as their diapered sissy. There is sexual contact between you and your wife's new lover.

Feel free to add to these or start any of the others. If they get going I'll add the links to this page.

Sauurman has started another story at:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid/1346329
You are a woman in a lesbian relationship and your partner brings another woman into the relationship.

Credil has started one at:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1868888-Threes-a-crowd/map/1142121
You are a man in a straight relationship and your partner brings another woman and her lesbian partner into the relationship. You and the other woman's partner are treated like baby girls
